author: KevinMarquette
body:
I have a class based DSC resource that inherits the `test` function from another class. If the inherited class is not in the same file as the DSC resource, then loading the file will fail with a `ParseException`

If these are combined into one file then it works. If the `[DscResource()]` attribute is removed from the class then this also works.

While I compile all my classes into the PSM1 at build time, my dev import prefers to load them as individual files for local dev and debug work. This also prevents the base class from being defined in another module.

# Steps to reproduce
Create these 2 files:

```powershell
#BaseObject.ps1
class BaseObject
{
    [bool] Test()
    {
       return $true
    }
}
```

```powershell
# ChildObject.ps1
[DscResource()]
class ChildObject : BaseObject
{
    [DscProperty(key)]
    [String] $name

    [ChildObject] Get () {return $this}

    [void] Set () {}
}
```
Then import them one at a time in this order.

```powershell
. .\BaseObject.ps1
. .\ChildObject.ps1
```
# Expected behavior

Both files should parse and import into the current session without any errors. Then the both objects should be available for use in the current session.

# Actual behavior

We get this `ParseException` on the 2nd file:

```none
At .\ChildObject.ps1:1 char:1
+ [DscResource()]
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The DSC resource 'ChildObject' is missing a Test method that returns [bool] and accepts no parameters.
    + CategoryInfo          : ParserError: (:) [], ParseException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : DscResourceMissingTestMethod
```

# Environment data

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.1.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16299
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: class based DscResource requires inherited class to be in same file
